definitions.definition: The academic staff at schools, colleges, universities or not-for-profit research institutes, as opposed to the students or support staff.

definitions.example: She transferred from the Faculty of Science to the Faculty of Medicine.

definitions.definition: An ability, skill, or power, often plural.
definitions.example: He lived until he reached the age of 90 with most of his faculties intact.

definitions.definition: A power, authority or privilege conferred by a higher authority.
(Church of England) A licence to make alterations to a church.
